name: Gregory Wickings
text: Worst Hungry Howie's ever. Rude Manager, terrible service, and nasty food. Avoid it if you can. Asked for light butter, the sandwich was so drenched that it needed to be thrown away. These people don't care at all. Their managers are just as bad.

name: Dawn Klein
text: Great service and can‚Äôt beat their pizza specials. Love the choice of several types of crust toppings (butter and sesame seeds). Easy access in parking lot of D&W Breton Village.

name: Kyle Richard
text: 3.5 and declining. Declining to give you what you ordered and when you call them back they give you a bunch of lip. I will update if they refund me.

name: Jason H
text: Pre ordered online for 6:30pm, order was ready to go on time , staff was very friendly and the order was spot on. We haven't had a howies in Canada in over 14 years,  it was nice to remember what I've missed for so long.  I will definitely order from that location again!

name: Nina Harmon
text: Please when you change you ingredients let people know. Tour food is now very nasty. I was supposed to get boneless wings and I got nuggets with buffalo sauce. Very disappointed. Food used to be good. My kids were very disappointed.

name: James Luke
text: Good price good pizza.

name: Donnato Ortiz
text: Awesome pizza the best

name: Michael Guzman
text: Idk why anyone would willing eat this stuff.

name: Keenan Thomson
text: Hard to find a better deal for $15. The two pizzas and Howie bread is enough to feed at least 4 people. Like many people, my favorite part is the crust. Variety of flavors that can be combined to create even more unique flavors.

name: Alexxas Pruitt
text: I have been ordering from HH for YEARS and the last couple times my pizza wasn‚Äôt that great. Tonight I paid almost $3 more for the same pizza I always get and no one could explain why. Oh and I also had to cut my own pizza slices since it was essentially just cut in half.

text: Not sure why this place has so many bad ratings. They are fast and the checkout girl is always super nice when I've been there. Sounds like the staff quality varies throughout the week, based on what others have said.
